name: Woolf Pack
description:
The Azure Lux Game Jam 2021 with the theme Chain Reactions. THIS IS THE MOST RAGE GAME OUT THERE!

The Woolf Pack is on the move keep them alive!

Keep your wolf hunting sheep pack alive while tracking down their next kill.

  • Select Sheep with Left Mouse Click
  • Move Sheep with Right Mouse Click
  • Drag and drop items on Sheep to save them
  • Escape will bring up Pause Menu

Hazard Counters:

  • Chemical -> Hazmat
  • Electrical -> Boots
  • Fire -> Fire Jacket
  • Gas -> Mask
  • Water -> Rubber Ducky

When a Sheep hits a hazard it gets a little mad and will spread it to other nearby Sheep if the hazard is spreadable. Spreadable hazards are Chemical, Fire, and Gas.

Leaderboard to show off!
